text: Samantha Taylor (born 25 May 1983) is a Canadian equestrian. She competed in two events at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vancouver
title: Samantha Taylor (equestrian)
